author: Aldo Zilli
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Heat the olive oil and butter together in a pan and gently fry the celeriac for 4-5 minutes, or until beginning to brown. Stir in the cream and cheese, then transfer to an ovenproof gratin dish. Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes, or until golden-brown on top and bubbling.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  25g/1oz butter,  ½ celeriac, peeled and grated,  100ml/3½fl oz double cream,  55g/2oz Stilton cheese, crumbled
